description: A security vulnerability in HPE XP P9000 Command View Advanced Edition (CVAE) Device Manager (DevMgr 8.5.0-00 and prior to 8.6.0-00), Configuration Manager (CM 8.5.0-00 and prior to 8.6.0-00) could be exploited to allow local and remote unauthorized access to sensitive information.

product.name: HPE XP P9000 Command View Advanced Edition (CVAE)

enisaIdProduct.product_version: DevMgr 8.5.0-00 and prior to 8.6.0-00, CM 8.5.0-00 and prior to 8.6.0-00
